text: Aram Indriyam is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Kudamaloor Rajaji, starring Siddhique and Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Siddhique * Jagathy Sreekumar ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Aram Indriyam
